features: Give Your Face A Natural Glow By Using This Anti Aging Facial Toner For Women & Men. This Nourishing Toner Improves Fine Lines, Skin Tone, Elasticity, & Rebalances The Skin’s Ph Levels. . Its An Ultimate Choice If Your Goal Is Glowing, Ageless Skin.

Face-rejuvenating Skin Toner With Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid, Licorice Root Extract, And Other Natural Ingredients. Use It To Revitalize Dull Skin, Refresh The Complexion And Soothe Irritated Skin. It's A Drop By Drop Solution To Keep Your Skins Moisture Level Healthy And Hydrated. Gently Refines Pores For A Radiant Look

You Will Fall in Love with This Hydrating Toner Spray for Face. Infused With Vitamin E, Tiger Grass & Licorice Root Extract, It’s A Blend of Natural Ingredients That Helps to Boost Your Skin's Hydration Levels, Brighten Your Complexion and Improve the Smoothness of Your Face, Neck and Décolleté.

Perfect For All Skin Types, This Gentle & Calming Toner Is Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid to Deeply Moisturize and Soothe Stressed-out Skin – Leaving You Feeling Fresh and Renewed. If You Are Looking for A Gentle Toner That Will Hydrate, Soothe, And Soften Your Skin, This Is It

Free From All the Harsh Chemicals, Parabens, Dyes & Alcohol This pH Balancing Moisturizing Toner for Face Only Contains the Premium Ingredients That Work Wonders for All Skin Types. We Take Pride in Not Only in Our Top-Quality Products but Excellent Customer Service As well, If You Don't Like Any of Our Products, We Offer A days Money Back Guarantee

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Story Reflectiozz Cosmetic Is A USA Based Black Owned Business That Believes In Quality Natural Skin Care Products, The Owner Gerber Is A Certified Make Up Artist, A Skin Care Fanatic & A Renown Loctician From Philadelphia Serving The Community For More Than 15 Years. As An Advocate For Natural Skin Care, Reflectiozz Cosmetic Offers High-Quality Products That Are Made From All-Natural Ingredients. All Our Products Are Cruelty-Free, Vegan & Free From Chemicals No One Wants In Their Skincare Products. With A Focus On Encouraging Women & Men To Take Care Of Their Skin Naturally, Reflectiozz Cosmetic Was Born.
Enriched with Nourishing Ingredients & Free from Harmful Chemicals
Misting Toner Use after a Cleanser to prep the face for Serum & Moisturizer Or Use as A Hydrating Mist Directly Anytime You Want
From Cleanser To Moisturizer We Got You Covered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alcohol-Free Toner with Hyaluronic Acid
reviews.reviewText: This product works very well and it really it a great toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I didn't notice much change.
reviews.reviewText: Maybe I have to use it longer but I've been using everyday and it seems watered down. I haven't seen much difference in my face. I don't have much to say about this one. It has natural ingredients so that a plus. I will update if anything changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good toner for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I usually hate using toner because it burns, especially wherever I have a blemish. This is a skincare line I've come to love for how gentle and effective it is for my sensitive skin. I use the cleanser that goes with this first, pat dry, then spray the toner on problem areas. For me, that's my chin and neck. I wait a few seconds, then use a microfiber towel to massage the toner into my face and neck until it is dry.My acne is hormonal so topical skincare only helps so much but this does the job better than others I have tried, and without burning or being too drying. The misting bottle works very well and the spray is a very fine, light mist so you don't use too much product. 5/5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars heavy spray, mild fragrance
reviews.reviewText: I am in my late 40's with extremely dry, sensitive skin.This comes completely plastic sealed so any tampering would be evident. The bottle is white plastic so there is light protection. The issue I have with the packaging is that the bottom of the bottle is rounded and I seem to knock it over as often as I set it up successfully.The pump is typical press spray and didn't take any priming. It is a fairly thick spray and uneven, no gentle mist here. The product feels very wet . . . mostly because it releases so much with every pump.This has a very light fragrance but I doubt that it is an added fragrance with how subtle it is.Application, once dry, is not sticky, shiny or tacky.In general, I tend to see facial sprays as more treat than treatment, and this certainly falls in that category. I haven't seen an improvement in my skin, and I don't find it particularly moisturizing. I didn't have any negative reactions from my skin, but also can't say that I got any benefits other than a refreshing wake me up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing toner, love the spray, hydrated skin
reviews.reviewText: *I started using the toner, serum, and moisturizer from Reflectionz the same day. Steps 2,3,&4 of their skincare routine. I used my current face wash and I also continued to use my vitamin C in the morning and retinol every other night. When my face wash runs out, I will absolutely be buying this brands face wash.This hydrating toner does exactly what it says, hydrates. You can apply this with the spray directly into your face, or use a cotton pad. I enjoyed spraying this directly onto my face, it felt cool and refreshing. One spray was a little more than enough to do my face, so I patted some on my neck too. I've been using this for only a few days, but I feel that my skin looks brighter, and my face definitely feels more hydrated than normal throughout the entire day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as good as standard Witch Hazel.
reviews.reviewText: This product arrived nicely packaged, in a clean tamper-proof bottle. There was no leakage. It has a pleasant, barely perceptible scent. I have been using this daily for more than a week, about 4 sprays to the face after washing. It feels clean, light, and refreshing.Here's the rub...I'd been using plain old witch hazel for toning before trying this product, and to me, the witch hazel feels MORE refreshing, cleaner, lighter and cooler. It has proven effective for my pores and you get twice as much for half the price. I will continue using this to see if there are any noticeable long term benefits, but I highly anticipate I will be returning to witch hazel once this supply of toner is depleted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have really sensitive skin but this toner hasn't caused any breakouts so far. I also have really dry skin, especially around my nose and mouth, so this toner helps keep my skin hydrated. It does what it's supposed to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This toner is pleasant, but I think overpriced for what it offers. I'm used to a toner with slightly more astringent to remove debris in the pores. This one is very soft and gentle, but so isn't doing that function. I like that it's almost scent free. I spray it onto a cotton pad and dab on my skin. I haven't noticed extra moisturizing, but I do like removing those last vestiges of cosmetics before bedtime.
